## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMCalibratedMagneticField] returned by this property gives you the total magnetic field in the device’s vicinity without device bias. Unlike the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagnetometerData/magneticField] property of the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagnetometerData] class, these values reflect the earth’s magnetic field plus surrounding fields, minus device bias.

If the device does not have a magnetometer, the `accuracy` field of the property’s value (a [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMCalibratedMagneticField] structure) is [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy/uncalibrated].

# magneticField

**Instance Property**

Returns the magnetic field vector with respect to the device.

## Declaration

```swift
var magneticField: CMCalibratedMagneticField { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMCalibratedMagneticField] returned by this property gives you the total magnetic field in the device’s vicinity without device bias. Unlike the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagnetometerData/magneticField] property of the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagnetometerData] class, these values reflect the earth’s magnetic field plus surrounding fields, minus device bias.

If the device does not have a magnetometer, the `accuracy` field of the property’s value (a [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMCalibratedMagneticField] structure) is [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy/uncalibrated].

## Getting the Calibrated Magnetic Field

- **CMCalibratedMagneticField**: Calibrated magnetic field data and an estimate of the accuracy of the calibration.
- **CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy**: Indicates the calibration accuracy of a magnetic field estimate
